sub_title: Senior Program/Project Manager in Area developmt, Speciality Airport Master Planning and Interface and Stakeholder mngmt
summary:
Profiel en ervaring:
Procesmanagement op het gebied van Gebied-en lokatie ontwikkeling. Zowel binnenstedelijk, vaak in de vorm van herstructurering, alswel uitleglokaties. Hierbij is de generalistische kennis ten aanzien van: business cases, grondexploitaties, stedenbouw, procedures, Milieu effect rapportages, verkeer, groen en water aanwezig. Verder is de communicatie naar alle relevante stakeholders zoals o.a. bewoners, politiek, betrokken overheden etc. verreist. Al deze competenties samengevat in Omgevingsmanagement, zijn van belang omdat je als procesmanager verantwoordelijk bent voor de besluitvorming in het bestuurlijke veld zowel bij overheden, ontwikkelaars, bedrijven als woningcorporaties.

Specialties: Specialistiche kennis:
Business cases, grondexploitaties in relatie tot functies en vormgeving in stedenbouwkundige concepten in zowel stedelijk gebied alswel luchthavens. Daarnaast leidinggeven zowel projectmatig alswel hierarchisch aan (project)teams van generalisten alswel specialisten. Sensitiviteit ten aanzien van Omgevingsmanagement and stakeholder management.

Experienced professional in area and building development with special knowledge about high quality transport hubs for passengers and freight; having a special mix of process- and project management skills and substantive knowledge of specialities like Airport Master Planning. Very pragmatic individual with strong analytical and innovative skills finding creative and workable solutions. Likes to work with and lead teams to get the best out of a variety of people with different cultures and skills.

projects.title: Schiphol Trade Park
projects.description:
Client: Schiphol Area Development Company at Amsterdam Airport Schiphol
The development contained logistics, aerospace, fashion, perishables, life sciences and ICT/high tech companies. The project has an estimated investment value of circa €70 - 80 million and will be built over the next 20 years, starting in 2014. The area is a transport hub for freight, connected to the Schiphol airport by a special truck lane and to the rest of Europe via high speed trains and highways network.

Henk was responsible for the master plan and detailed planning of the 380 hectare business site referred to as the “A4 Zone West” and now called STP. He led the design coalition consisting of the Urban Planning Office KCAP, Landscaping Office West 8 and ARCADIS to integrate and bring forward a detail master plan.

projects.title: Project Manager Multi Modal development phase 1 of Schieveste, Schiedam
projects.description:
Client: City of Schiedam in the region of Rotterdam
The Schieveste development is situated around the integrated train, metro and highway hub and is connected to the centre of Schiedam, near Rotterdam.  Henk was the project manager responsible for developing both the master and urban plans. During this project he faced considerable challenges imposed by external financial constraints. He was appointed to represent the local government and worked tirelessly to successfully negotiate terms and conditions between the project developer and social housing organisations. Henk worked closely with the Mayor of Schiedam during the political decision making process which formed the local government policy

profile_positions.description:
Actief leidinggegeven als process- en projectmanager voor langere perioden van 1 a 2 jaar bij Gebiedsontwikkelingen zoals o.a.:  Schieveste Schiedam, Triangel Waddinxveen, Ontwikkeling RDM West in Rotterdam,  Maasterras Dordrecht, Schiphol Trade Park (onderdeel van ACT) in Haarlemmermeer en Suikerfabrieks terrein in Groningen. Recent als omgeving-en stakeholder manager betrokken bij het project en constructie management van de Nieuwe Pier en Stationsgebouw op de Luchthaven Schiphol. Energie transitie, klimaat adaptatie en Duurzaamheid zijn de nieuwe specialisme waar ik Arcadis voor de Divisie Gebouwen in opdrachten en tenders in vertegenwoordig. Recent heb ik met een team van Arcadis de opdracht voor de Provincie Gelderland om tot een CO2 reductie van 55% in 2030 afgerond.
Daarnaast adviesopdrachten vervult zoals risico analyse Zuidplas, herbestemming forten Nieuwe Hollandse Waterlinie, herontwikkelingsmogelijkheden ziekenhuis-en verzorgingslokaties.
Working as a programme and senior projectmanager the last 18 years on urban planning projects around the city of Rotterdam and the new Schiphol Trade Park (STP). STP is a unique working environment to the south of Amsterdam Airport Schiphol: a breeding ground for international commerce and innovative logistics.Here is room for business activity from every level of the logistics chain: storage & distribution, value added logistics and e-commerce.

profile_positions.title: Principal Consultant

profile_positions.description:
Was assigned for one year by ARCADIS Netherlands to an English ARCADIS Operating Company EC Harris registerede in Doha, Qatar.

First project Doha, Qatar.
Position: Senior Project Manager within the Qatar Cultural Sport Hub project.
Client: Ashghal Public Works Authority Qatar

First project for the Joint Venture MACE/EC Harris spanning a broad range of projects across 4 different  sectors; Healthcare, Ports, Educational and General projects which includes municipal and recreational facilities. 
Henk was as a senior project manager on the Qatar Cultural Sport Hub (QCSH) responsible for infrastructure and public transport within QCSH. Investment at master plan phase inclusive of real estate costs is circa $4-5 billion dollar.
The QCSH will create a substantial recreation, leisure and sport development zone that will serve as an event and entertainment district south east of Doha. It will also contain a stadium for the FIFA World Cup 2022 and a range of Olympic venues planned.

Second project Doha Qatar
Position: Airport Engineering Director 
Client: Supreme Committee for Delivery and Legacy for the FIFA 2022 World Cup Qatar.

In this second project Henk gave an advice, after meetings with Qatar Airways and Hamad International Airport, in the form of a report about the demand and necessary capacity of the airport during the World Cup Qatar in 2022.
